translations: v.足够，足以；满足……的需求；有能力

sentences.sentence: Generally a brief note or a phone call will suffice.
sentences.translation: 通常写个便条或打个电话就足够了。

sentences.sentence: A cover letter should never exceed one page; often a far shorter letter will suffice.
sentences.translation: 附信绝不应超过一页；通常一封更短的信就足够了。

sentences.sentence: Here a single example will suffice.
sentences.translation: 这里只举一个例子就够了。
